text: While the page is loading, don't show "No agents running" in the top right - don't show that div/input at all, just a loading spinner

proposedTasks.title: Show loading spinner instead of empty-state agent indicator during page load
proposedTasks.description:
When the Build phase page (or any page displaying the agent status indicator in the top-right) is still loading data, the 'No agents running' div/input should not be rendered. Instead, display a loading spinner in its place until the initial data fetch completes.

Acceptance criteria:
- While the page/component is in a loading state (initial fetch in progress), the agent status indicator area in the top-right renders a compact loading spinner instead of the 'No agents running' message.
- Once data has loaded, the indicator displays the correct state ('No agents running' if idle, or the active agent info if running).
- The spinner matches the existing design system's loading indicator style.
- No layout shift occurs when transitioning from spinner to the loaded indicator.

taskTitles: Show loading spinner instead of empty-state agent indicator during page load
